TextLibrary.Text: You are the one who stole the Hammer!
You are the one who stole the Hammer!
You are the one who stole the Hammer!
You are the one who stole the Hammer!
It belonged to Jarl. I was just returning it.
It belonged to Jarl. I was just returning it.
It belonged to Jarl. I was just returning it.
It belonged to Jarl. I was just returning it.
Belonged to Jarl? I took that Hammer because Jarl stole my Helm. I demand you bring me my Helm! Now!
Belonged to Jarl? I took that Hammer because Jarl stole my Helm. I demand you bring me my Helm! Now!
Belonged to Jarl? I took that Hammer because Jarl stole my Helm. I demand you bring me my Helm! Now!
Belonged to Jarl? I took that Hammer because Jarl stole my Helm. I demand you bring me my Helm! Now!
Well, that seems fair, I guess...
Well, that seems fair, I guess...
Well, that seems fair, I guess...
Well, that seems fair, I guess...
